original_requirement.hlr: i want to create a login button

sequential: Design and Development of Login Button
Integration of Login Button with Backend

questions.question: What are the specific visual elements and interactions that should be included in the login button?
questions.context: Understanding the UI/UX requirements for the login button

questions.question: What are the specific actions that should occur when the login button is clicked?
questions.context: Understanding the end-to-end functionality of the login button

questions.question: What are the API endpoints that the login button needs to interact with?
questions.context: Understanding the system integration requirements for the login button

questions.question: What are the error scenarios that need to be handled when the login button is clicked?
questions.context: Understanding the edge cases for the login button

questions.question: What are the accessibility requirements for the login button?
questions.context: Understanding the non-functional requirements for the login button

questions.question: How should the login button behave on different devices and screen sizes?
questions.context: Understanding the responsive design requirements for the login button

epics.title: Design and Development of Login Button
epics.description: This epic involves the design and development of a login button. The UI/UX Designer will be responsible for creating a visually appealing and user-friendly login button.
epics.business_value: Having a login button is crucial for user authentication. It allows users to access their personal accounts, enhancing user experience and security.
acceptance_criteria: The login button should be clearly visible on the homepage.
The login button should be responsive and function as expected.
assumptions: The website has a user authentication system in place.
risks: The login button may not be compatible with all browsers or devices.

epics.title: Integration of Login Button with Backend
epics.description: This epic involves the integration of the login button with the backend. This includes setting up API endpoints and handling server responses.
epics.business_value: Proper integration ensures that the login button functions correctly, allowing users to authenticate and access their accounts.
acceptance_criteria: The login button should send a request to the correct API endpoint when clicked.
The login button should handle server responses correctly.
dependencies: Design and Development of Login Button
assumptions: The backend server is set up and running.
risks: The login button may not function correctly if the API endpoint changes or if the server is down.
